item.description:
You First - Secrets to Creating a Fulfilling Life

Come and join us for an amazing presentation with Nat as he shares his insights and perspectives on what it takes to enjoy a fulfilling life. About our speaker: Nat Couropmitree, founder of ProsperityLighthouse.com and host of two online radio shows, "Living Your Passion" and "Law of Attraction Success Radio", is an incredibly unique spiritual entrepreneur and life coach. His colorful background in medical research, sales, technology and holistic exercise has allowed him to connect with and understand people from diverse industries and challenges. Nat has a real flair for supporting overwhelmed entrepreneurs to declutter their energy and leverage their resources so that they can finally stop working so hard and have peace of mind, freedom and abundance. Visit: www.prosperitylighthouse.com

We meet for a potluck lunch and connecting from 11:30 am - 12:30 pm followed by our presentation.

RSVP including what you'll bring to the potluck.

$10 meetup fee.
item.how_to_find_us: I will welcome you at the front door
item.name: May Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
